text: a l laoh chea anak del ban bangkeut puok anak pi pheap tnkhsaaoy kraoyomk trong ban thveu aoy mean pheap khlangokla banteabpi tnkhsaaoy kraoyomk tiet trong ban thveu aoy tow chea tnkhsaaoy ning chasachrea vinh banteabpi pheap khlangokla . trong bangkeut avei tam te trong mean chetnea . haey trong mha doeng mha mean anoupheap
